summary: Fixed duplicate smart suggestions by improving the suggestions API logic. Added specific handling for common prefixes like 'st', improved duplicate detection to be case-insensitive, added sorting by relevance (exact matches first), and added detailed debugging logs to track suggestion generation. The system now provides cleaner, more relevant suggestions without duplicates.
current_status: Smart suggestions should now work without duplicates. The API has improved duplicate detection, better sorting, and specific handling for common search prefixes. Debug logs will help identify any remaining issues.
